body.note: Opening the phone back cover can expose you to electrical components. Always power off the phone and disconnect it from any charger before opening the back cover to avoid injury or damage.
Touching internal components without proper grounding can cause static electricity discharge, which may damage sensitive parts.
Puncturing or mishandling the battery can cause it to catch fire or explode. Handle the battery with care and avoid using sharp tools near it.
Opening the phone may void your warranty. Check your warranty terms before attempting any repairs or modifications.
